speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mike from XYZ Collections. I'm calling about your overdue account. Can you confirm your date of birth for verification?

speaker: Customer
text: Sure, my date of birth is April 12, 1985.

speaker: Agent
text: Great, thanks. Now, can you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, I live at 123 Main Street, Springfield.

speaker: Agent
text: Alright, you have a balance of $1,200. It's time to settle this shit. How are you going to pay today?

speaker: Customer
text: I prefer to discuss my payment options calmly first.

speaker: Agent
text: Calmly? Seriously? You owe us money, and you're talking about 'calmly'? Just get your shit together and pay up!

speaker: Customer
text: I understand that, but I need to know all my options before I commit to anything.

speaker: Agent
text: Options? You think you can just pick and choose? We are not running a charity here, you know!

speaker: Customer
text: I am just trying to understand my responsibilities and plan accordingly.

speaker: Agent
text: Responsibilities? How about you just quit making excuses? Pay what you owe!

speaker: Customer
text: I will make a payment soon, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

speaker: Agent
text: You're wasting my time. Just give me a damn date when you'll pay, or I’ll escalate this further!

speaker: Customer
text: I appreciate your urgency, but I need some time to sort things out and I will get back to you.

speaker: Agent
text: You better not keep dragging this out, or I'll make your life a living hell!
